source: blandfruit
target: 无味果

source: Distant cousin of the rotberry, the pear-shaped produce of the blandfruit bush tastes like caked dust. The fruit is gross and unsubstantial but isn't poisonous. Perhaps it could be cooked.
target: 腐莓的远亲，来自无味果树丛的梨状产物，尝起来犹如一团泥巴。果实粗糙且松软，但并没有毒性。也许可以煮食。

source: You can find this plant randomly in the dungeon.
target: 你可在地牢中概率找到该植物。

source: seed of blandfruit
target: 无味果之种

source: blindweed
target: 致盲草

source: Upon being touched a blindweed perishes in a bright flash of light. The flash is strong enough to disorient for several seconds.
target: 在被碰到后，致盲草会瞬间枯萎并释放一道强光。这道光足以刺伤受害者双眼，使其暂时失明。

source: _The Warden_ will channel a blindweed's energy into a temporary shroud of invisibility, instead of being disoriented.
target: _守望者_能将致盲草的能量化为一层短时间的隐形迷雾，而不会被致盲。

source: seed of blindweed
target: 致盲草之种

source: mageroyal
target: 魔皇草

source: You feel refreshed.
target: 你感觉浑身清爽。

source: The mageroyal's prickly flowers contain a chemical which is known for its properties as a strong neutralizing agent. Anything that steps in this plant will be cleansed of many negative effects.
target: 魔皇草的带刺花朵含有一种化学物质，因其强大的中和性质而闻名。任何踏入这株植物的东西将会被净化掉许多负面效果。

source: In addition to the neutralizing effect, _the Warden_ will become temporarily immune to all area-bound effects when stepping on mageroyal.
target: 当踩踏一株魔皇草时，_守望者_在获得中和效果以外，还能短暂地对所有环境影响免疫。

source: seed of mageroyal
target: 魔皇草之种

source: earthroot
target: 地缚根

source: When a creature touches an earthroot, its roots create a kind of immobile natural armor around it.
target: 碰到地缚根后，它的根系会在踩踏者周边形成某种无法移动的天然护甲。

source: The roots of an earthroot plant will move with _the Warden_, providing her mobile barkskin armor.
target: _守望者_能将这种护甲转化为可移动的树肤护甲。

source: seed of earthroot
target: 地缚根之种

source: herbal armor
target: 植被护甲

source:
A kind of natural, immobile armor made of bark and twine.

This herbal armor will block %d damage from any physical hit, until it eventually runs out of durability and collapses.

As the armor is immobile, moving will cause it to break apart and be lost.

Armor remaining: %d.
target:
这是一种由层层树皮和藤蔓盘结而成的，不可移动的天然护甲。

每当你受到物理攻击时，植被护甲都会吸收%d点伤害，直到其耐久被耗尽并瓦解。

该护甲是不可移动的，所以一旦你离开原位护甲便会被破坏，消失不见。

剩余护甲量：%d点

source: fadeleaf
target: 消逝草

source: Touching a fadeleaf will teleport any creature to a random place on the current level.
target: 任何触碰到消逝草的生物都会被传送到当前层的一个随机地点。

source: The teleportation effect of fadeleaf is more potent for _the Warden_, teleporting her back to the end of the previous dungeon level.
target: _守望者_能进一步发挥消逝草的空间魔力，直接回到上一层的下楼梯处。

source: seed of fadeleaf
target: 消逝草之种

source: firebloom
target: 烈焰花

source: When something touches a firebloom, it bursts into flames.
target: 烈焰花被任何物品触碰到时，都会化为一团火焰。

source: When she tramples a firebloom, _the Warden_ will be briefly imbued with flame instead of being harmed.
target: _守望者_能将有害的火焰转化为短时的烈焰之力。

source: seed of firebloom
target: 烈焰花之种

source: icecap
target: 冰冠花

source: Upon being touched, an icecap lets out a puff of freezing pollen. The freezing effect is much stronger if the environment is wet.
target: 冰冠花在被接触到时会喷射出一团能冻结周遭的花粉。冻结效果会在潮湿环境中大幅增强。

source: When she tramples an icecap, _the Warden_ will be briefly imbued with frost instead of being harmed.
target: _守望者_能将有害的冰冻转化为短时的寒霜之力。

source: seed of icecap
target: 冰冠花之种

source: This plant has no special effect when used by the Warden.
target: 守望者踩踏这株植物不会获得额外效果。

source: You can find this plant randomly in the dungeon, or grow it from its associated seed.
target: 你可在地牢中概率找到该植物，或使用其种子种植。

source: seed of %s
target: %s之种

source: PLANT
target: 种植

source: Throw this seed to the place where you want to grow a plant.\n\n%s
target: 把这粒种子丢到你想长出一株植物的地方。\n\n%s

source: seed
target: 种子

source: rotberry
target: 腐莓

source: The berries of a young rotberry shrub taste like sweet, sweet death. Over a few years, this rotberry shrub will grow into another rot heart. When trampled, a young rotberry will produce a small puff of toxic gas.
target: 未成熟的腐莓丛结出的莓果尝起来更像是甜蜜的死亡。经过成年累月的生长，这株腐莓丛终会成熟为另一棵腐莓核心。被踩踏后，这株未成熟的腐莓会释放少量毒气。

source: Normally a rotberry bush only produces a little gas when trampled, but _the Warden_ is able to harness energy from it to temporarily boost her strength!
target: 遭到践踏时腐莓丛通常只会喷出一小股毒气，但_守望者_却能联结其中的魔力，在短时间内提升力量！

source: You can grow this plant from its associated seed during a specific quest.
target: 你可在某个任务中使用其种子种植该植物。

source: seed of rotberry
target: 腐莓之种

source: You can find this item during a specific quest.
target: 你可在某个任务中找到该物品。

source: sorrowmoss
target: 断肠苔

source: A sorrowmoss is a flower (not a moss) with razor-sharp petals, coated with a deadly venom.
target: 断肠苔（实为花卉而非苔藓）是一种花瓣利如刀片，表面覆有致命毒液的植物。

source: When she tramples a sorrowmoss, _the Warden_ will be briefly imbued with toxin instead of being harmed.
target: _守望者_能将有害的毒素转化为短时的毒素之力。

source: seed of sorrowmoss
target: 断肠苔之种

source: starflower
target: 星陨花

source: A rare plant, starflower is said to grant holy power to whomever touches it.
target: 星陨花较为罕见，据说其能够为任何接触它的人赋予神圣之力。

source: In addition to being blessed, _the Warden_ will gain a significant amount of wand recharging when she tramples a starflower.
target: _守望者_在踩踏星陨花时不仅能受到祝福，还能获得较长时间的法杖充能。

source: seed of starflower
target: 星陨花之种

source: stormvine
target: 风暴藤

source: Gravity affects the stormvine plant strangely, allowing its whispy blue tendrils to 'hang' on the air. Anything caught in the vine is affected by this, and becomes disoriented.
target: 引力似乎并不能正常地作用在风暴藤上，它蓝色的藤蔓能够"挂"在空中。任何被风暴藤缠到的生物也被这种奇怪的引力影响，并失去方向感。

source: _The Warden_ is able to control the gravitational effect of stormvine, and will briefly levitate when she tramples one.
target: 守望者能够操纵风暴藤的魔力，因而在踩踏之后可以获得短暂飘浮的能力。

source: seed of stormvine
target: 风暴藤之种

source: sungrass
target: 阳春草

source: Sungrass is renowned for its sap's slow but effective healing properties.
target: 阳春草因其汁液缓慢但显著的疗伤效果而家喻户晓。

source: _The Warden_ can receive healing from trampled sungrass even if she moves away from it.
target: _守望者_能将阳春草的治疗魔力随身携带。

source: seed of sungrass
target: 阳春草之种

source: herbal healing
target: 草药疗养

source:
Sungrass possesses excellent healing properties, though it is much slower than a potion of healing.

Moving off the plant will break the healing effect.

Healing remaining: %d.
target:
阳春草拥有优秀的治疗能力，尽管治疗速率比治疗药剂慢很多。

脱离植株将会打断治疗效果。

剩余治疗量：%d

source: swiftthistle
target: 速行蓟

source: When trampled, swiftthistle will briefly accelerate the flow of time around it, allowing the trampler to perform several actions instantly.
target: 被踩踏后，速行蓟会加速周围的时间流动，让踩踏者可以瞬间行动数次

source: In addition to gaining instantaneous actions, _the Warden_ will also get a brief haste boost when trampling swiftthistle.
target: _守望者_踩踏速行蓟不仅能获得瞬时行动的机会，还能在短时间内极速奔跑。

source: seed of swiftthistle
target: 速行蓟之种

source: time bubble
target: 时间气泡

source: A small bubble of accelerated time, allowing actions to be performed instantly. Attacking or using magic will break this effect however.\n\nTurns remaining: %s.
target:
这是一个加速时间运行的气泡。

你可以在气泡中瞬间进行多次行动，但是攻击或施法都会打断这个效果。

剩余时长：%s回合
